Articles.Content:
I recently downloaded the Modular Kolonization mod by RoverDude and put it in my game data but the parts have not shown up. I was hoping anyone could shine some light on this.

I've re-entered it multiple times the same way I've put other mods(Karbonite, MechJeb, Kerbal attachment systems, etc.) in in this same method, demonstrated in the Scott Manley "Kerbal Space Program - How To Install Mods"

, and there's no error messages appearing as far as I can tell. Could you please give me a hand and shed some light on this? It be very appreciated. I've been trying for some time to download this really cool mod.

I recently downloaded the Modular Kolonization mod by RoverDude and put it in my game data but the parts have not shown up. I was hoping anyone could shine some light on this.

I've re-entered it multiple times the same way I've put other mods(Karbonite, MechJeb, Kerbal attachment systems, etc.) in in this same method, demonstrated in the Scott Manley "Kerbal Space Program - How To Install Mods"

, and there's no error messages appearing as far as I can tell. Could you please give me a hand and shed some light on this? It be very appreciated. I've been trying for some time to download this really cool mod.

Ok, From the sound of it you didn't install it correctly. Always check the file structure inside the .zip, not everyone packages them the same way. You can't just unzip a mod into gamedata and expect it to work. In this case, the mod folders that go in gamedata are nested inside a couple folders. From the zip folder, you'll need to open the MKS-master folder and then copy the contents of the Gamedata folder from the zip into your KSP/Gamedata folder.

by the way, your colors will display correctly if you leave out the "!important."
